title: Fragment, 17th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic threads
Technique: plain weave with discontinuous wefts (tapestry or k'ossu)
creditline: Gift of W. and J. Sloane
description: Fragment of silk tapestry in pale orange with one roundel containing a 5-claw gold dragon surrounded by blue cloud bands.
